article: Hundred years ago, the sky was very close to the Earth. Human did not have to plant their own food. _ , when men and women were hungry, they just reached _ and _ off a piece of the sky to eat. The sky sometimes tasted like ripe apples while other times it tasted like fried chips. The sky was always delicious. Some people in the country did not use the gift of the sky _ . they took more than they could eat. Some people even threw the extra pieces into the _ . One day, the annoyed sky turned dark in the early morning. Black clouds _ over the land. And s great sky voice said to all the pcople,"You are _ my gift of food. Do not take more than you can eat. I don't want to see pieces of me in the garbage any more, or I will _ my gift away."All the people trembled with _ . For a long time, they were careful. However, on Christmas eve, one person called Tom took so many delicious pieces of sky _ be couldn't eat them all. He knew he must not take them away. He tried to give the pieces to his wife."Here, wife,"Tom said, "You cat the rest.""I can't ."his wife said, "I'm too full." Tom asked all his kids to help him eat the delleions pieces of sky, but the kids couldn't have one more _ . So Tom decided to try to _ the pieces at the bettom of the garbage pile. All of a _ , the sky becatne angry and the clouds turned black."You haven't cherished my gift of food once again ", shouted the sky, "This time I will go away so you cannot see me any more."All of the people _ ."What will we eat? Who will _ to death!"The sky said, "you will have to learn _ to plant crops in the ground and _ in the forests. If you work hard, you may learn not to waste the gifts of nature."  _ watched as the sky sailed away. From then on, they worked hard to grow their food and cook their meals. They are _ deeply that they should not waste the gifts of nature.
